Hand - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.player
Class Hand contains a set of all the Player's available Assistant cards which have a matching back
Hand(Mage) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Hand
Constructor Hand creates a hand of playing cards instance.
handleAction(ChooseCloud) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
Method handleAction(ChooseCloud) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Students from the Cloud, whose index is obtained to the Entrance.
handleAction(EntranceToHall) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
Method handleAction(EntranceToHall) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Student, whose color is obtained by the message, from the Entrance to the Hall.
handleAction(MoveMN) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
Method handleAction(MoveMN) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves mother nature by a number of steps equal to the value passed as a parameter in the message and checks if the game must end.
handleAction(MoveToIsland) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
Method handleAction(MoveToIsland) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Student, whose color is obtained by the message, from the Entrance to the Island, whose index is obtained by the message.
handleCharacter(Request, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers.Controller
Handles all Requests regarding Characters
handleCharacter(Request, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers.ExpertController
Method handleCharacter handles the choice of a Character card : it triggers the correct method relying on the description of the received card.
handleClientDisconnection(boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
Method handleClientDisconnection closes the streams.
handleClientDisconnection(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
Method handleClientDisconnection calls the method handleDisconnection of the corresponding lobby then remove from the map id-Socket this client id
handleDisconnection(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
Method handleDisconnection is used to disconnect a player from the lobby.
handleJoin(Join, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
Method handleJoin manages a join message from a client, it also handles the re-connection of a client.
handleMessage(Request, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
Method handleMessage forward the message to the controller if the game is started.

Receives a Request and visits the message
handleMessage(Answer) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
Handles all Updates calling the respective visitor method
